summary: A collection of command‑line utilities that support the Lark parsing library, including building parsers, converting Nearley grammars to Lark format, serializing grammar objects to JSON, and bundling the library into a single self‑contained script.
business_intent: Simplify the creation, conversion, serialization, and deployment of Lark parsers, enabling developers to integrate parsing capabilities more easily into applications and distribute them as standalone modules.
